document_data.mainbody:
Hogarth Harrowhand was the head of the trappers guild of the Graevelwood clanhold of rock gnomes during the midâ€“14 century DR. Although his clan was rather secretive, and didnt reveal their location in the Arn Forest, they did often sell the pelts of beavers, among other animals, with traders in Deadsnows or Citadel Adbar.
Like many in his clan, Hogarth was an expert scout, and as per his role in the community, an exceptional trapper.
